Title: Glory
Writer: Kristina Grozeva, Decho Taralezhkov, Petar Valchanov
Actors: Stefan Denolyubov, Margita Gosheva, Alexandra Angelova, Poli Angelova
Plot: A reclusive Bulgarian railway trackman finds millions of cash spilled on the tracks and turns them in to the police. When the transport ministry's head of PR Julia Staikova decides to use ...
